note: This project name is “Karachi Shelter old age & special child care Center”. The Project was established in 2017 and was registered with the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Sindh. It may be mentioned here that my younger son named Dr. Dominic Younus looks after the entire works of this Organization. We have established two care centers in Karachi. One in Gulshan-e-Iqbal and the other is at Ghazi-e-Abad, Orangi Town. The head office of Karachi Shelter is situated at House – 277, Street
